data.title: Derek Apfel on LinkedIn: GoldenSource joins Snowflakeâ€™s native app ecosystem with Omni
data.meta_description: Very proud of the entire GoldenSource team and what we've built with our partners at Snowflake to address our customers' evolving data needs.
data.text:
ICYMI: Announced at Snowflake Data Cloud Summit, Peak Performance is a new Snowflake Native App built to help organizations optimize their Snowflake usage. Learn all about it on our #AlationBrief on June 18 at 8am PDT / 4pm BST! You will see how Peak Performance elevates your enterprise visibility with the Alation Data Intelligence Platform. Takeaways: ğŸ’¡ Alation Consumption Tracker and new Query Log Ingestion (QLI) usage use cases ğŸ’¡ How to use Peak Performance to analyze and prioritize workloads to migrate to the cloud ğŸ’¡ How to activate Peak Performance through the Snowflake Native App Marketplace ğŸ’¡ Where to use new visibility to maximize your Snowflake maturity and raise your data operations to peak performance Your speakers are Anthony Lempelius, Technology Alliances Director at Alation and Sreeraj K., CEO of Spreems Inc. Register now: https://lnkd.in/enCp7zYa #datacloudsummit #alationbrief #alationcommunity #ai #alationaiready

The Times, They Are A-Changin' - In Business Intelligence ğŸ” Yesterday's analytics were great, but in today's modern analytic world, where more and more data is moving to the cloud, it's crucial to have a Business Intelligence (BI) tool that's purpose-built for the cloud. That's where Astrato comes in! ğŸš€ ğŸ’¡ Here are some key features that make Astrato the go-to choice for cloud-based analytics: ğŸŒ Cloud-Native Architecture ğŸ”’ Robust Security ğŸŒ€ Data Integration âœ Native Writeback ğŸ“œ Custom Reporting ğŸ’ª Advanced Analytics | AI/ML ğŸ“ˆ Data App Embed Ability ğŸ” Ready to embrace the power of cloud analytics? Connect with me to learn more about how Astrato can revolutionize your analytics game. Let's ride the winds of change together! ğŸŒªï¸ğŸ’¼ Image Credit: https://lnkd.in/g7KztyJx #Analytics #CloudAnalytics #Astrato #BusinessIntelligence #DataDrivenDecisions

Itâ€™s week 19 of our Feature Fridays series, and today we are announcing Metric Detail Cards in Pulse Results (Experiment Scorecard). ğŸ“Š You probably know that you can create powerful custom metrics with complex business logic on top of raw events. As your teamâ€™s Metric Catalog grows, it can get tricky for non-metric creators to understand metric definitions when they are analyzing experiment results. ğŸ“œ Now you can simply hover over a metric to see a card with key details such as: - Metric definition - Input events - Possible dimensions to break down by - Statistical methods applied (like CUPED or Winsorization) This way, everyone in the organization is empowered to self-serve and better understand experiment results, including custom metrics. Check out the feature and track our latest updates across our fully-hosted (Cloud) and Warehouse Native offerings here: https://lnkd.in/g4D7Q9N3 #experimentation #abtesting #analytics #datascience

"Cloud is the future of data management," says, well, everyone. But did you know: ğŸ˜© 83% of all data migration projects fail ğŸ˜¨ More than 50% of migrations exceed their budget But don't panic. ğŸ˜± Alation, Snowflake, and Spreems Inc can help. We're accelerating data modernization with Peak Performance, a new Snowflake Native App built to help organizations optimize their Snowflake usage. Peak Performance offers a set of ready-to-use dashboards with reporting features, making it easy for leaders to track cloud data consumption and costs at scale. Learn more from Sreeraj K.: https://lnkd.in/gubVqJtR â„ï¸ Get the full scoop at our Booth (1330) at #datacloudsummit! See how we have a proven track record of helping customers like Alkermes accelerate their data governance journey. #datamodernization #alationpartners #snowflake #spreems #ai #alationaiready

Listen to the latest episode of Big Ideas In App Architecture: https://cockroa.ch/3ukxIs1 Fivetran, the automated data movement platform, helps Fortune 500 companies transport data across different sources from point A to point B. To learn about the leading #techmanagement and #engineering triumphs that have helped them in their mission to make #data simple, we sat down with the VP of #PlatformEngineering at Fivetran (and former Googler) Mike Gordon. Listen to the full episode for a discussion on: - The influence of accessibility on data scaling in the cloud. - The impact of rapid technological advancements on #datamanagement. - The crucial role of efficiency in the process of data scaling.
